snippet.title: City of Brass on Nintendo Switch - Available Now!
snippet.description:
https://www.cityofbrassgame.com/

Become a daring thief in City of Brass, a first-person action adventure from senior BioShock developers. Armed with scimitar and a versatile whip, you’ll lash and slash, bait and trap your way to the heart of an opulent, Arabian Nights-themed metropolis!

Play as the sword-wielding Fool & Traveler, the knife-fighting Brigand, the spear-throwing Soldier, and the strong-but-slow Hellion … with more to come!
